an7.58:4.1: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa arakkheyyāni, tīhi ca anupavajjo.
an7.58:4.4: natthi tathāgatassa kāyaduccaritaṃ yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya:
an7.58:5.1: * Parisuddhavacīsamācāro, bhikkhave, tathāgato;
an7.58:5.2: natthi tathāgatassa vacīduccaritaṃ yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya:
an7.58:6.2: natthi tathāgatassa manoduccaritaṃ yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya:
an7.58:7.2: natthi tathāgatassa micchāājīvo yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya:
an7.58:9.3: Tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessati:
an7.58:9.6: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi. (1)
an7.58:10.1: Supaññattā kho pana me, bhikkhave, sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā.
an7.58:10.2: Yathāpaṭipannā mama sāvakā āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
an7.58:10.3: Tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessati:
an7.58:10.4: ‘itipi te na supaññattā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā.
an7.58:10.5: Yathāpaṭipannā tava sāvakā āsavānaṃ khayā … pe …
an7.58:10.8: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi. (2)
an7.58:11.1: Anekasatā kho pana me, bhikkhave, sāvakaparisā āsavānaṃ khayā … pe …
an7.58:11.3: Tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessati:
an7.58:11.4: ‘itipi te na anekasatā sāvakaparisā āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī’ti.
an7.58:11.6: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi. (3)
an7.58:13.1: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri tathāgatassa arakkheyyāni, imehi ca tīhi anupavajjo”ti.
